005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.configuration;
007
008import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
009
010/**
011 * This interface provides methods for retrieving and updating the configuration
012 * of processors and parsers in this library. This provides a mutable view of
013 * the current configuration.
014 *
015 * @param <T>
016 *          the type of the feature set
017 */
018public interface IMutableConfiguration<T extends IConfigurationFeature<?>>
019    extends IConfiguration<T> {
020  /**
021   * Turn on the provided feature.
022   *
023   * @param feature
024   *          the feature to turn on
025   * @return the updated configuration
026   * @throws UnsupportedOperationException
027   *           if the feature is not a boolean valued feature
028   * @see IConfigurationFeature#getValueClass()
029   */
030  @NonNull
031  default IMutableConfiguration<T> enableFeature(@NonNull T feature) {
032    return set(feature, true);
033  }
034
035  /**
036   * Turn off the provided feature.
037   *
038   * @param feature
039   *          the feature to turn off
040   * @return the updated configuration
041   * @throws UnsupportedOperationException
042   *           if the feature is not a boolean valued feature
043   * @see IConfigurationFeature#getValueClass()
044   */
045  @NonNull
046  default IMutableConfiguration<T> disableFeature(@NonNull T feature) {
047    return set(feature, false);
048  }
049
050  /**
051   * Replace this configuration with the {@code other} configuration.
052   *
053   * @param other
054   *          the new configuration
055   * @return the updated configuration
056   */
057  @NonNull
058  IMutableConfiguration<T> applyConfiguration(@NonNull IConfiguration<T> other);
059
060  /**
061   * Set the value of the provided {@code feature} to the provided value.
062   *
063   * @param feature
064   *          the feature to set
065   * @param value
066   *          the value to set
067   * @return the updated configuration
068   * @throws UnsupportedOperationException
069   *           if the provided feature value is not assignment compatible with the
070   *           features value type
071   * @see IConfigurationFeature#getValueClass()
072   */
073  @NonNull
074  IMutableConfiguration<T> set(@NonNull T feature, @NonNull Object value);
075}
